templates: [X] was founded in the location of [Y].
[X] was created in the location of [Y].
[X] was formed in the location of [Y].
[X] was established in the location of [Y].
P740.description: location where a group or organization was formed

P103.description: language or languages a person has learned from early childhood

templates: [X] was born in the location of [Y].
[X] entered this world in the location of [Y].
P19.description: most specific known (e.g. city instead of country, or hospital instead of city) birth location of a person, animal or fictional character

templates: [X] passed away in the location of [Y].
[X]'s life ended in the location of [Y].
P20.description: most specific known (e.g. city instead of country, or hospital instead of city) death location of a person, animal or fictional character

templates: [X] can be found in the continent of [Y].
[X] is situated within the continent of [Y].
P30.description: continent of which the subject is a part

templates: [X] is governed from the capital city of [Y].
P36.description: primary city of a country, state or other type of administrative territorial entity

templates: The central office for [X] is situated in [Y].
The headquarters of [X] is located in [Y] .
P159.description: specific location where an organization's headquarters is or has been situated. Inverse property of "occupant" (P466).

P449.description: network(s) the radio or television show was originally aired on,  including

templates: The original language of work of [X] is [Y].
[X] was originally drafted in the language of [Y].
[X] was originally crafted in the language of [Y].
P364.description: language in which a film or a performance work was originally created. Deprecated for written works; use P407 ("language of work or name") instead.

templates: [X] was created in the country named [Y].
[X] was developed in the country named [Y].
[X] was developed in the country named [Y].
P495.description: country of origin of this item (creative work, food, phrase, product, etc.)

templates: [X] adheres to the belief system of [Y].
[X] is affiliated with the religious tradition of [Y].
P140.description: religion of a person, organization or religious building, or associated with this subject

P138.description: entity or event that inspired the subject's name, or namesake (in at least one language)

P47.description: countries or administrative subdivisions, of equal level, that this item borders, either by land or water

templates: The creative work's genre of [X] is [Y].
The creative piece [X] belongs to the genre of [Y].
For [X], the genre can be described as [Y].
P136.description: creative work's genre or an artist's field of work (P101). Use main subject (P921) to relate creative works to their topic

templates: [X] used to work in the location of [Y].
[X] was employed in the location of [Y].

P108.description: person or organization for which the subject works or worked

templates: The person who serves as the head of [X] is [Y].
The person who presides over [X] is [Y].
P488.description: presiding member of an organization, group or body

templates: The person who serves as the head coach for [X] is [Y].
The person who assumes the role of head coach for [X] is [Y].
The person who holds the position of head coach of [X] is [Y].
P286.description: on-field manager or head coach of a sports club (not to be confused with a general manager P505, which is not a coaching position) or person

templates: The person at the head of the government of [X] is [Y].
The person known as the leader of the government of [X] is [Y].
The person in charge of the government of [X] is [Y].
The person who presides over the government of [X] is [Y].
P6.description: head of the executive power of this town, city, municipality, state, country, or other governmental body

P39.description: subject currently or formerly holds the object position or public office

templates: [X] is a sport team member of [Y].
[X] is part of the sports roster for [Y].
P54.description: sports teams or clubs that the subject currently represents or formerly represented

templates: [X] is represented by the music label [Y].
[X] as their record label represented by [Y].
[X] has signed with as their record label [Y].
P264.description: brand and trademark associated with the marketing of subject music recordings and music videos

templates: [X] place of residence is located in [Y].
P551.description: the place where the person is or has been, resident

templates: [X] is in a romantic relationship with [Y].
P451.description: someone with whom the person is in a relationship without being married. Use 'spouse' (P26) for married couples

templates: [X] is under the control of the person named [Y].
[X] is subject to the command of the person named [Y].
[X] complies with the instructions of the person named [Y].
[X] is subordinate to the person named [Y].
P1308.description: persons who hold and/or held an office or noble title

P210.description: chief representative of a party in an institution or an administrative unit (use qualifier to identify the party)

templates: [X] is managed by the person named [Y].
[X] is lead by the person named [Y].
The position of manager for [X] is held by [Y].
P1037.description: person who manages any kind of group
